description.ko: 끊임없이 내리는 빗줄기 사이로 네온 사인이 빛나는 거대한 미래 도시의 전경으로, 첨단 기술과 거친 삶이 공존하는 사이버펑크 세상을 압도적인 디테일로 보여줍니다.
description.en: A breathtaking view of a sprawling futuristic city where neon lights pierce through the constant rain, showcasing a high-tech, low-life society in stunning detail.

prompt: Cinematic wide shot of a futuristic cyberpunk metropolis at night, rain-slicked streets reflecting vibrant neon signs in purple, cyan, and hot pink, flying vehicles weaving between massive skyscrapers with holographic advertisements, dense atmospheric fog, high-detail textures, hyper-realistic, 8k resolution, synthwave aesthetic, bustling street life with glowing tech-wear.
